H0.text: when does middle-earth shadow of mordor come out. October 2013

H1.text: when does middle-earth shadow of mordor come out. November 2014

H2.text: when does middle-earth shadow of mordor come out. June 2015

H3.text: when does middle-earth shadow of mordor come out. September 2014

A4.text: The game was released for PlayStation 4, Windows, and Xbox One in September 2014.

A5.text: Although the game was originally scheduled for release on October 7, 2014, according to Warner Bros. its release was moved up to September 30 in North America and October 3 in the United Kingdom due to 'fans' excitement'.
